TopicTitle: Is there a calculation tool for RSS

Articles.Content: ksp.olex.biz is a great website but for kerbol system. Is there a same calculation toll for RSS ?

You might try Kerbal Alarm Clock mod

You can also get it on CKAN.

Try Transfer Window Planner mod... also on CKAN.

 

Edited March 4, 2016 by TrooperCooper
In RSS you can also "virtually" use real datas and trajectories (or at least some planetary alignement like the one for the Voyagers)

The three answers so far are correct but a bit terse. So I'll just repeat with a few more words: Transfer Window Planner and Mechjeb both take their input from the running game. If you use them in RSS, you will get RSS results. Don't know about Kerbal Alarm Clock.

TWP silently assumes that you start and end in an equatorial orbit which isn't always a sane assumption in RSS. For that reason, I prefer the MJ "Advanced Transfer to Another Planet" feature.

Edited March 5, 2016 by Laie
